title: African Shea Butter Cream (100% Pure & Raw, Gold) 8 Oz.
description: Pure Shea butter is coveted throughout Africa for its natural skin care benefits. Several great benefits of Shea butter are: Use as a shaving cream for a smooth silky shave, stretch mark prevention during pregnancy, fights the effects of aging, repairs rough damaged skin, treatment of dry skin, eczema, minor burns, pain relief from swelling and arthritis, improves muscle relaxation and stiffness, sunscreen, due to its rich content of vitamins E & F, Treats dark spots, skin discolorations, blemishes, diaper rash and as a hair conditioner.

title: Jane Carter Hair Nourishing Cream, 4 Ounce
description: Can be used on hair and skin, leaves everything it touches feeling renewed and moisturized. This product is perfect for adding shine and repairing dry hair. This product can be used on all textures of hair.

title: Mebco Tortoise Shower Detangler
description: Popular professional comb styles in an elegant tortoise finish. Come in several different styles.

title: Seche Restore Nail Polish, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Seche restore is the only thinner to thin a bottle of Seche vite to its original consistency. Will not diminish shine or dull colors. Only replaces those ingredients which have evaporated from the bottle.

title: Goody Ouchless Detangling Comb Brown #88236
description: Flexible teeth to eliminate hair breakage. Spine conforms for comfortable detangling. For detangling wet or dry hair.For detangling wet or dry hairFlexible teeth to eliminate hair breakage. Spine conforms for comfortable detangling.
